title: But Then Again I Could Be Wrong: The Book of Rants
description: Gee ... I always wanted to write a book. I never thought I would but then again I could be wrong . Here is a collection of some of the past few years rants as broadcast on WDMT 102.3 The Mountain as part of my show Rising at Ten.I am always and forever a student of humans and I try to make sense of life in northeast Pennsylvania.Topics
author: Jim Rising
